00016 /*-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00017  * File:    crle.h
00018  * Purpose: Header file for run-length encoding information.
00019  * Dependencies: should only be included from hcompi.h
00020  * Invokes: none
00021  * Contents: Structures & definitions for run-length encoding.  This header
00022  *              should only be included in hcomp.c and crle.c.
00023  * Structure definitions:
00024  * Constant definitions:
00025  *---------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00026 
00027 /* avoid re-inclusion */
00028 #ifndef __CRLE_H
00029 #define __CRLE_H
00030 
00031 #if defined c_plusplus || defined __cplusplus
00032 extern      "C"
00033 {
00034 #endif                          /* c_plusplus || __cplusplus */
00035 
00036 /*
00037    ** from crle.c
00038  */
00039 
00040     extern int32 HCPcrle_stread
00041                 (accrec_t * rec);
00042 
00043     extern int32 HCPcrle_stwrite
00044                 (accrec_t * rec);
00045 
00046     extern int32 HCPcrle_seek
00047                 (accrec_t * access_rec, int32 offset, int origin);
00048 
00049     extern int32 HCPcrle_inquire
00050                 (accrec_t * access_rec, int32 *pfile_id, uint16 *ptag, uint16 *pref,
00051                int32 *plength, int32 *poffset, int32 *pposn, int16 *paccess,
00052                  int16 *pspecial);
00053 
00054     extern int32 HCPcrle_read
00055                 (accrec_t * access_rec, int32 length, void * data);
00056 
00057     extern int32 HCPcrle_write
00058                 (accrec_t * access_rec, int32 length, const void * data);
00059 
00060     extern intn HCPcrle_endaccess
00061                 (accrec_t * access_rec);
00062 
00063 #if defined c_plusplus || defined __cplusplus
00064 }
00065 #endif                          /* c_plusplus || __cplusplus */
00066 
00067 /* size of the RLE buffer */
00068 #define RLE_BUF_SIZE    128
00069 /* NIL code for run bytes */
00070 #define RLE_NIL         (-1)
00071 /* minimum length of run */
00072 #define RLE_MIN_RUN     3
00073 /* maximum length of run */
00074 #define RLE_MAX_RUN     (RLE_BUF_SIZE+RLE_MIN_RUN-1)
00075 /* minimum length of mix */
00076 #define RLE_MIN_MIX     1
00077 
00078 /* RLE [en|de]coding information */
00079 typedef struct
00080 {
00081     int32       offset;         /* offset in the file */
00082     uint8       buffer[RLE_BUF_SIZE];   /* buffer for storing RLE bytes */
00083     intn        buf_length;     /* number of bytes in buffer */
00084     intn        buf_pos;        /* offset into the buffer */
00085     uintn       last_byte,      /* the last byte stored in the buffer */
00086                 second_byte;    /* the second to last byte stored in the buffer */
00087     enum
00088       {
00089           RLE_INIT,             /* initial state, need to read a byte to determine
00090                                    next state */
00091           RLE_RUN,              /* buffer up to the current position is a run */
00092           RLE_MIX
00093       }                         /* buffer up to the current position is a mix */
00094     rle_state;                  /* state of the buffer storage */
00095 }
00096 comp_coder_rle_info_t;
00097 
00098 #ifndef CRLE_MASTER
00099 extern funclist_t crle_funcs;   /* functions to perform run-length encoding */
00100 #else
00101 funclist_t  crle_funcs =
00102 {                               /* functions to perform run-length encoding */
00103     HCPcrle_stread,
00104     HCPcrle_stwrite,
00105     HCPcrle_seek,
00106     HCPcrle_inquire,
00107     HCPcrle_read,
00108     HCPcrle_write,
00109     HCPcrle_endaccess
00110 };
00111 #endif
00112 
00113 #endif /* __CRLE_H */
